services.name: Business Strategy Consulting
services.description: Help small businesses develop growth strategies and optimize operations.

services.name: Leadership Coaching
services.description: One-on-one coaching for executives and business owners.

tiers.name: Strategy Session
tiers.description: One-time deep dive into your business

faqs.question: What industries do you work with?
faqs.answer: We work with a variety of industries including tech, professional services, retail, and manufacturing. Our frameworks apply across sectors.

faqs.question: How long does a typical engagement last?
faqs.answer: Most strategy projects run 3-6 months. Coaching engagements are typically ongoing monthly retainers.

policies.name: Cancellation Policy
policies.content: Cancel meetings 24 hours in advance. Late cancellations may be charged 50% of the session fee.

goals.primaryObjective: Respond to every lead within 5 minutes so no opportunity is missed
painPoints: Missing calls while in client meetings
Forgetting to follow up with prospects
Spending too much time on repetitive email responses
